EmailTemplate.subject: Free Tool Friday: vStencils and Virtual Health Monitor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FREE DATACENTER STENCILS: <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=092614>
VMTurbo's FREE downloadable topology stencils are just our latest way of giving back to the IT community. These HD icons download in both .vssx and .gstencil formats, for use with Microsoft Visio® and OmniGraffle.
FREE VIRTUAL HEALTH MONITOR: <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=092614>
VMTurbo's FREE Virtual Health Monitor downloads and deploys in 15 minutes and provides FREE hypervisor-agnostic monitoring for up to 10,000 VMs. Stop paying for monitoring tools. Virtual Health Monitor is free forever. Try VMTurbo Control <http://vmturbo.com/product/operations-management-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=092614> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
